pages.text: The Vault Decoration Scroll is an extremely rare Vendoor item. You can use it to craft a variety of decorative versions of The Vault blocks.
The Deco Brazier is a decorative version of the Brazier, you can toggle the flame on and off!
The Deco Lodestone is a decorative version of the Lodestone found in Elixir vaults, you shift-right click it to get a random message!
The Deco Obelisk is a decorative version of the Obelisk found in Hunt the Guardian vaults, you can right-click it to activate and de-activate it.
The Deco Scavenger Altar is a decorative version of the Scavenger Altar, it can suck in your items you put in and spit them back out.
